title: 死亡不掉落指令是什么？

replies.txt_content:

/gamerule doKeepInventory true
嗯。。我待会试试

replies.author: Xiaofeilong
replies.txt_content: 死亡不掉落指令：  /gamerule keepInventory true

replies.author: arbecue
replies.txt_content: 在里面输 死亡不掉落: /gamerule keepInventory true

replies.author: XingChen_DBc
replies.txt_content: /give 名字 137 1 能命令块面输 死亡掉落: /gamerule keepInventory true 防爆: /gamerule mobGriefing False 重设点:/spawnpoint @a

replies.author: lorinder
replies.txt_content: 在对话框里输入：“/gamerule doKeepInventory true”
